    Posts

    Kubernetes | secondary

    Written by Anas Shahab- 12 Sep 2021
    Kubernetes is essentially a container orchestrator that helps make sure that each container is where it is supposed to be and that the containers can work together.

    jekyll | primary

    Written by Anas Shahab- 10 Jul 2021
    Jekyll is a simple, blog-aware, static site generator for personal, project, or organization sites.

    OpenStack | secondary

    Written by Anas Shahab- 12 Jun 2021
    OpenStack is basically an open source cloud software that provides a framework of tools for creating and managing public and private clouds. It controls large parts of computing, storage and network resources in a data center that can be managed through a dashboard.

    Juju | primary

    Written by Anas Shahab- 12 Jun 2021
    Juju allows one to easily deploy services with its charms architecture. Charms are collections of scripts that contain all the operations necessary to deploy, configure, scale, and maintain cloud applications easily with Juju.

    MAAS | secondary

    Written by Anas Shahab- 12 Jun 2021
    MAAS provides self service, remote installation of Ubuntu, Windows, etc on real servers that turn the data center into a bare metal setup. To allows new machines to be provisioned. In other words, it is a way of quickly installing OS like an Ubuntu server in many computers.
